name: test_e2e_with_logs[182_XSS_POLY_007]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_POLY_007` |
| **Name** | Polyglot event handler |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | polyglot |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

- **Payload**: `jaVasCript:/*-/*`/*' /*onerror=alert(1)// */`
